channel.title: ToL Friends Missing From List
channel.description:
#### What happened?
Steam updated ToL to 1.0.5b and one of the people I had friended in game is no longer showing in my list at all. Not offline, not online or in lobby or matchmaking. All but one of my friends are still showing as normal. My friend also has the same issue with my being absent from his list.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen?
Steam updates ToL to 1.0.5b and my friend being visible in my friend list on the right side of the screen with my other friends.
#### Steps to reproduce:
Load game.
#### Comments:
This could possibly an “off by one” error

item.title: ToL Friends Missing From List
item.dc:creator: O_O
item.description:
Honestly, I think maybe somehow when we changed names something in the database got screwed up? Are you using mongodb?

I am friends with my brother in the game. I can’t add him: it says he is already added. He can’t add me for the same reason. We just don’t show up on the list.

I believe it may have been when we used the in game name change functionality. Just a hunch.

item.title: ToL Friends Missing From List
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
Just an update, we found the cause (full details in Discord #news): Long story short, if you have ever declined (even accidentally) ONE friend request, you auto decline all future friend requests.

This will probably be fixed in <1 week. We’ll fix it and reset all declined friends so you can then try again.
